text:
Is there a way to use the v3 list endpoint to get all recently added contacts?

With the v1 API, I used to use `contacts/v1/lists/all/contacts/recent` . Is there a v3 equivalent?
You'd want to use a crm v3 endpoint rather than a lists v3 endpoint for this. Probably the `/crm/v3/0-1/search` endpoint and sorting on `hs_createdate` descending
